title: Greely's Cove
description: It is their dream. It is their nightmare. It is their home... Greely's Cove.Carl Trosper—a successful Washington D.C. businessman, he has come back to claim his son, Jeremy... after his wife mysteriously killed herself.Jeremy—an autistic child, he is suddenly able to see and hear and speak... but is his soul truly his own?Dr Hadrian Craslowe—a brilliant psychologist responsible for Jeremy's cure. What terrible methods of treatment has he mastered?Lindsay Moreland—Jeremy's aunt, she wants custody of the child... but can she control his strange behaviour?Hannie Hazelford—an eccentric old woman, she dares to fight the evil with a frightening power of her own.Robinson Sparhawk—a forensic psychic, he comes to Greely's Cove to help solve the townspeople's disappearances.Stu Bromton—the town sheriff, he is tied to a community he has grown to hate.They know that something evil has come to live in their town. Now every man and woman is afraid. Afraid of things that walk in the night.Afraid of the house on the edge of town. Afraid of the loved ones they have buried in... Greely's Cove.
author: John Gideon
